title: How to Live Well, Love AI, and Party Like a 6-Year-Old
description: WIRED cofounder Kevin Kelly believes tech ultimately bends towards good—you just might have to wait a while. For now, he's got a book of life advice.

title: Stack Overflow Didn’t Ask How Bad Its Gender Problem Is This Year
description: The coding hub’s 2022 survey found that 92 percent of its users were men. This time around it simply dropped the question.
